scheme_name: Scheme for Providing Employment Opportunities by Establishing Piggery, Sheep and Goat Units (General) (Haryana)
description: This scheme provides financial assistance to establish piggery, sheep, goat, and poultry units to generate employment opportunities for rural households in Haryana.
key_features: Financial support for setting up poultry and other livestock units
Aims to promote self-employment in rural areas

benefits.unit_types: Poultry, piggery, sheep, and goat units

category_criteria: Open to general category residents of Haryana
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must have access to land or space for setting up units

special_notes: Scheme covers multiple livestock types, including poultry
